idinfo.useconst: By acceptance of this data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including the liability disclaimer, whenever the user transmits or provides the GIS Data(or any portion of it) to another user.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

dataqual.logic: This is a general point location of WPC's easements. It was created by placing point features in the general location of the easement.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

enttyp.enttypd: Point location of Western Pennsylvania Conservancy easments

attr.attrdef: Name of WPC project associated with the easment
Acres held in the easment according to WPC records
County in which easment is located
Township in which easment is located
X coordinate of point location estimate

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Y coordinate of point location estimate

overview.eadetcit: Shape = Point Project_name = Name of WPC project where easement is located Acres = Approximate acreage County = County where easement is located Township = Township where easement is loacted X_coord = Longitude Reference of Point Y_coord = Latitude Reference of Point Tract_number= easement tract number

distinfo.distliab:

THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, the GIS Data must include a copy of this disclaimer.

Those parties involved with the development and distribution of this data will not be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of the use or inability to use the FILES or any accompanying documentation.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
